application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Conditions 3 (External Materials), 4 (Detailed Drawings), 9 (Construction Management Plan, 10 (Refuse and Recycling) and 11 (Cycle Parking) of planning permission 19/02242/FUL (Erection of two storey extension to accommodate three additional residential units)
decision_conditions: Due to the insufficient information submitted for Condition 10 (Refuse and Recycling) and 11 (Cycle Parking) of planning permission 19/02242/FUL the proposal fails to ensure the provisions of adequate cycling and refuse facilities to the satisfaction of the council in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.Given that Conditions 3, 4, 9 have been submitted as part of a single application with the abovementioned conditions, the whole application is refused.
